snippet.title: Skelethrone: The Prey - Gameplay Trailer (August 2023)
snippet.description:
This game is a challenging 2D action platformer with RPG elements inspired by games like Castlevania and Dark Souls. 
Skelethrone: The Prey is a free prequel to the main game, setting the stage for the events that will unfold throughout Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona campaign.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2139870/Skelethrone_The_Prey/
